casebody.data:
GANNETT PACIFIC CORPORATION d/b/a Asheville Citizen-Times Publishing Company, an Hawaii Corporation, and Chesapeake Television, Inc. t/d/b/a WLOS-TV, a Maryland Corporation
v.
CITY OF ASHEVILLE and County of Buncombe. No. 415P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. James Gary Rowe, Asheville, for Gannett Pacific Corp. Robert W. Oast, Jr., for City of Asheville. Joseph Connolly, Asheville, for County of Buncombe. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 632 S.E.2d 586 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of August 2006 by Plaintiff (Gannett Pacific Corp.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th day of November 2006."
